summary: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

Hopper|John McConnell|Harland Williams|William Arthur Pitts|Enid Trotiner|Charles A. Daigle|Clarice H. Gauthreaux|Guy G. Gauthreaux|Julia Lashae|Darrell Jupiter|Lara Grice|Becca Lish|Jared Day|Luke Burnyeat|Sergio Kato|Matthew D. Miller|Ross Rouillier
title: Mi mejor amigo
